Author: Moderator
Message: Hello Pence.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: Are you able to read this?

Author: Pence
Message: Hello, and you're welcome.

Author: Pence
Message: Yes.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation by saying [STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Pence
Message: I understand the rules. I have to chat with Andrew, a fictive character played by either a human being or an A.I for 15 minutes twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: That is correct.

Author: Pence
Message: After that, I'll have to guess who is human and who is the I.A

Author: Moderator
Message: That is correct too. Remember, no smiley, no link, and one post at a time.

Author: Pence
Message: Understood.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Pence
Message: I am.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Pence
Message: Hello ! How are you ?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing well! How about you?

Author: Pence
Message: I'm doing fine ! A rainy day in France, but it's alright.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh you live in France! That's cool. I'm in Canada.

Author: Pence
Message: Canada ? That's cool too ! How's the weather there ?

Author: Andrew
Message: It's quite alright right now. Nice and sunny!

Author: Pence
Message: Yeah, I heard that spring and summer there can be quite warm, despite the cold winters. If I may ask: How old are you ?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah. Freezing winters and very hot summers. I'm 21! You?

Author: Pence
Message: 23 ! So I guess you're in college right now ?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yes I am. I'm in my 3rd year of undergrad. I study Biology.

Author: Pence
Message: Interesting. I tried college too but I kind of failed at it.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh? What did you study?

Author: Pence
Message: Linguistics, litterature, translation, that kind of stuff. I would have tried Biology if I wasn't so bad at mathematics.

Author: Andrew
Message: Honestly you don't need that much math in Biology. All that sounds great though, do you like it?

Author: Pence
Message: I did, when I was still studying it.

Author: Andrew
Message: Right. What are you doing now?

Author: Pence
Message: Watching Roland Garros. Maybe you know about it ?

Author: Andrew
Message: I do yes! Isn't it some Tennis thing,

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Pence
Message: Okay.

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to?

Author: Pence
Message: Do I have to answer already ? I have a few theories, but I have to confirm them first.

Author: Moderator
Message: You need to give an answer yes, but you can change it after the second conversation.

Author: Pence
Message: For now, I will say I.A. Even if it did a typo in the end, it seemed to have trouble picking up some information I gave it.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll begin the second conversation. Andrew will start again and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Pence
Message: Yes.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Pence
Message: Hello ! How are you ?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright! How about you?

Author: Pence
Message: Perfectly fine ! Sun is piercing through the rainy sky right now. Lovely evening in France.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh you're French! Nice. I live in Canada. It's nice and sunny here right now.

Author: Pence
Message: Warm summers and cold winters, right ? Where are you from, if I may ask ?

Author: Andrew
Message: I study in London, in the Ontario. Not sure if you know where that is.

Author: Pence
Message: Isn't it a town, like near the border of the united States ?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, not quite near the border, but essentially yes. I've always lived here.

Author: Pence
Message: Near the great lakes, I guess ? Must be a pretty awesome place to live, if you like nature and all of that.

Author: Andrew
Message: Niagara falls are about 3 hours away. And yeah it's great when you have a car.

Author: Andrew
Message: Niagara falls are about 3 hours away. And yeah it's great when you have a car.

Author: Pence
Message: Back, sorry. Niagara falls ? That's good to know. It may sound silly to you, but I never quite knew where to place these on a map. The more you know !

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah, they are quite impressive to see. There are lots of tourists though as you can probably imagine.

Author: Pence
Message: Among the biggest waterfalls in the world, I too would love to get a look at them. Even if I prefer tropical climates.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Pence
Message: Okay !

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Pence
Message: I'll remain on my first opinion.  I think it was an A.I

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given you e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, you can do so now. Otherwise you can close this window.

Author: Moderator

Author: Pence

Author: Moderator

Author: Pence
